author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Atul Vani for an issue reported by Soumya Jyoti Guru at http://markmail.org/message/whb4am3n6ngsuwgk. It's related to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3667 - OFBIZ-3667
Atul's note: I noticed some strange behavior (like there's little shifting of elements).
Jacques's note: I noticed them too (it's in the calling form or layer) but it's far better than before and IMO acceptable
